ovdesc.p: AA.AGENT.CUSTOMER maintains the tree structure between agents, their customers & customerâ€™s arrangements. The record will be created at agent + customer level. Within the record it will store their arrangements & EB.ACCRUAL ids of commissions paid out. EB.ACCRUAL id gets stored only when the commission is amortized on the agent arrangement.

desc.p: EB.ACCRUAL ids of commissions paid out. EB.ACCRUAL id gets stored only when the commission is amortized on the agent arrangement.
